title: Square, non-overlapping logo rendering in header and footer

requirements.summary: Ensure header and footer logos render in a true square, preserve aspect ratio, and never visually include/overlap navigation/tab UI while continuing to use the existing logo asset path.
acceptanceCriteria: In the SiteHeader, the logo renders within a square box and preserves its aspect ratio (no horizontal/vertical stretching).
In the SiteFooter, the logo renders within a square box and preserves its aspect ratio (no horizontal/vertical stretching).
On common viewport widths (mobile and desktop), the navigation buttons do not overlap the logo, and no tab-like UI elements appear inside the logo area.
The logo continues to load from the existing static path: /assets/generated/blaines-card-clinic-logo.dim_512x512.png.

file_operations.description: Add a reusable logo wrapper utility/class (square box, overflow hidden, consistent sizing) to enforce square rendering and prevent any visual bleed; keep styling changes within existing global styling entry points.

Wrap the logo image in a dedicated square container (using the new shared class) and ensure layout spacing prevents any nav/tab elements from visually overlapping the logo area across breakpoints; continue using src="/assets/generated/blaines-card-clinic-logo.dim_512x512.png".

Wrap the logo image in the same dedicated square container (using the shared class) and keep the image object-fit behavior so it preserves aspect ratio; continue using src="/assets/generated/blaines-card-clinic-logo.dim_512x512.png".

Replace the existing image content with the cropped/resized true-square version (same filename/path) so no extra padding or header-tab-like artifacts are present: frontend/public/assets/generated/blaines-card-clinic-logo.dim_512x512.png.
